videos.title: যে ১০ টি ভুল বিগিনার রিয়্যাক্ট ডেভেলপাররা করে থাকেন
videos.description: আপনারা যারা বিগিনার হিসেবে রিয়্যাক্ট জেস নিয়ে কাজ করা শুরু করেছেন, তারা রিয়্যাক্ট এর বেশ কিছু কনসেপ্ট ঠিক মতো আয়ত্ত না করতে পারার কারণে বিচিত্র কিছু সমস্যার সম্মুখীন হন এবং শেষ পর্যন্ত বুঝতে না পেরে হতাশ হয়ে পড়েন। তাদের জন্যই এই ভিডিওটি। এই ভিডিওতে আমি এমন ১০টি সমস্যার কথা তুলে ধরেছি যেগুলো বিগিনার হিসেবে আপনারা অহরহ সম্মুখীন হবেন। আশা করি ভিডিওটি দেখলে আপনাদের এই সমস্যাগুলো নিয়ে আর কনফিউশন থাকবেনা।
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: VS Code Snippets - Boost your productivity with User Snippets
videos.description: আমরা যখন Visual Studio Code Editor এ কাজ করি তখন অহরহ ব্যবহৃত কোড ব্লক গুলো আমাদের কে বারবার টাইপ করতে হয় এবং সামগ্রিকভাবে চিন্তা করলে এরকম ছোট ছোট ম্যনুয়াল কাজ আমাদের productivity অনেকাংশেই কমিয়ে দেয়। VS Code এর বিল্ট ইন ইউজার স্নিপেট ফিচারের মাধ্যমে আমরা কমন কাজগুলো স্নিপেট আকারে সাজিয়ে রেখে দিতে পারি এবং শর্টকাট কমান্ডের মাধ্যমে বড় বড় কোড ব্লক গুলো নিয়ে আসতে পারি। এই ভিডিওতে আপনারা এটাই জানতে পারবেন যে কিভাবে আমরা Visual Studio Code Editor এ কাস্টম স্নিপেট লিখতে পারি।
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: Tailwind CSS 3 tutorial - Upgrade to Tailwind 3 | Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial
videos.description: Tailwind CSS v3.0 came with incredible performance gains, huge workflow improvements, and a seriously ridiculous number of new features. In this tutorial - I have tried to explain different new features of Tailwind CSS version 3, how to install tailwind css 3, how to upgrade from tailwind v2 to v3 etc.
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: Debounce Function in JavaScript - JavaScript Job Interview question
videos.description: In this video, I have explained about the debounce function in JavaScript. This is a common question interviewers ask at Job Interviews. If you watch this video carefully, you will understand what is debounce and how to handle it with custom debounce function.
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: SASS Tutorial in English - Overview of SASS
videos.description: In this video, I have given a high level overview of popular CSS Pre-processor SASS which helps us managing our styles at scale. If you have a basic understanding of CSS & JavaScript, this 10 mins SASS Tutorial will help you getting started with SASS.
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: React Router DOM v6 Bangla Tutorial - Breaking Changes - React Router 6 vs 5
videos.description: In this React Router DOM v6 Bangla tutorial, you will learn how to install react router dom 6, what are the breaking changes in react router 6, difference between react router 6 vs 5, how to upgrade from react router v5 to react router v6.
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: Tailwind CSS Tutorial Bangla - Introduction to Tailwind CSS
videos.description: Tailwind is a utility-first CSS framework to rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML. In this Tailwind CSS tutorial, I have given a short introduction and overview of Tailwind CSS in Bangla language. Also, I have explained, why Tailwind vs Bootstrap debate should be stopped as both are useful in their own ways.
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: যে ১০ টি ভুল বিগিনার রিয়্যাক্ট ডেভেলপাররা করে থাকেন
videos.description: আপনারা যারা বিগিনার হিসেবে রিয়্যাক্ট জেস নিয়ে কাজ করা শুরু করেছেন, তারা রিয়্যাক্ট এর বেশ কিছু কনসেপ্ট ঠিক মতো আয়ত্ত না করতে পারার কারণে বিচিত্র কিছু সমস্যার সম্মুখীন হন এবং শেষ পর্যন্ত বুঝতে না পেরে হতাশ হয়ে পড়েন। তাদের জন্যই এই ভিডিওটি। এই ভিডিওতে আমি এমন ১০টি সমস্যার কথা তুলে ধরেছি যেগুলো বিগিনার হিসেবে আপনারা অহরহ সম্মুখীন হবেন। আশা করি ভিডিওটি দেখলে আপনাদের এই সমস্যাগুলো নিয়ে আর কনফিউশন থাকবেনা।
videos.author: LWS

videos.title: Framer Motion (for React)
videos.description: Framer Motion is a production-ready motion library for React from Framer. It's simple yet powerful, allowing you to express complex user interactions with robust, semantic markup.
videos.author: The Net Ninja

videos.title: Modern JavaScript Tutorial
videos.description: Modern JavaScript is a “safe” programming language. It does not provide low-level access to memory or the CPU, because it was initially created for browsers which do not require it. JavaScript’s capabilities greatly depend on the environment it’s running in. For instance, Node.js supports functions that allow JavaScript to read/write arbitrary files, perform networkrequests, etc.In-browser JavaScript can do everything related to webpage manipulation, interaction with the user, and the webserver.
videos.author: The Net Ninja

videos.title: Regexr Tutorial
videos.description: RegExr was created by gskinner.com, and is proudly hosted by Media Temple.Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. PCRE & JavaScript flavors of RegEx are supported. Validate your expression with Tests mode. The side bar includes a Cheatsheet, full Reference, and Help. You can also Save & Share with the Community, and view patterns you create or favorite in My Patterns.
videos.author: The Net Ninja

videos.title: SASS Tutorial - from scratch
videos.description: Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.Sass is completely compatible with all versions of CSS. We take this compatibility seriously, so that you can seamlessly use any available CSS libraries.
videos.author: The Net Ninja

videos.title: Firebase Functions Tutorial
videos.description: Firebase is an app development platform that helps you build and grow apps and games users love. Backed by Google and trusted by millions of businesses around the world.
videos.author: The Net Ninja

videos.title: Adobe Xd Coffee Shop Website Design Tutorial
videos.description: Adobe XD is a vector design tool for web and mobile applications, developed and published by Adobe Inc. It is available for macOS and Windows, and there are versions for iOS and Android to help preview the result of work directly on mobile devices.
videos.author: The Net Ninja

videos.title: Flutter Animation Tutorial - Intro & Setup
videos.description: Hey gang, in this Flutter Animation tutorial series we'll look at some of the best ways to animate elements, using a combination of built-in implicit animations & custom animations using animation controllers. To begin with, we'll get set up with the Flutter starter project.
videos.author: The Net Ninja

videos.title: PHP Tutorial (& MySQL) - Why Learn PHP?
videos.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language geared toward web development. It was originally created by Danish-Canadian programmer Rasmus Lerdorf in 1994. The PHP reference implementation is now produced by The PHP Group
videos.author: The Net Ninja

videos.title: Learn Data Structures & Algorithms As A Developer
videos.description: A data structure is a named location that can be used to store and organize data. And, an algorithm is a collection of steps to solve a particular problem. Learning data structures and algorithms allow us to write efficient and optimized computer programs.
videos.author: Traversy Media

videos.title: Next.js Crash Course
videos.description: Next.js is an open-source development framework built on top of Node.js enabling React based web applications functionalities such as server-side rendering and generating static websites
videos.author: Traversy Media

videos.title: Learn The MERN Stack - Express & MongoDB Rest API
videos.description: MERN is a free and open-source JavaScript software stack for building dynamic web sites and web applications. A variation known as MERN replaces Angular with React
videos.author: Traversy Media

videos.title: Python Crash Course For Beginners
videos.description: Python is a high-level, interpreted, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation. Python is dynamically-typed and garbage-collected.
videos.author: Traversy Media

videos.title: C++ Tutorial for Beginners - Learn C++ in 1 Hour
videos.description: C++ is a general-purpose programming language created by Danish computer scientist Bjarne Stroustrup as an extension of the C programming language, or 'C with Classes'.
videos.author: Programming with Mosh

videos.title: Insertion Sort Algorithm Made Simple [Sorting Algorithms]
videos.description: Insertion sort is a simple sorting algorithm that builds the final sorted array one item at a time. It is much less efficient on large lists than more advanced algorithms such as quicksort, heapsort, or merge sort.
videos.author: Programming with Mosh

videos.title: Node js Architecture | Mosh
videos.description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on a JavaScript Engine and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser, which was designed to build scalable network applications.
videos.author: Programming with Mosh

videos.title: Demo of An E-commerce App Built with Angular, Firebase and Bootstrap 4
videos.description: Angular is a TypeScript-based free and open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations. Angular is a complete rewrite from the same team that built AngularJS.
videos.author: Programming with Mosh

videos.title: Build A Calculator With JavaScript Tutorial
videos.description: Projects are the best way to learn JavaScript, and a calculator is one of the best projects to choose. A calculator covers all the complex interactions with UI and JavaScript while still being simple enough for people of any skill level.In this video I will walk you through the steps it takes to build a completely modern calculator using JavaScript best practices. If you want to learn JavaScript or improve your JavaScript skill this is a must do project
videos.author: Web Dev Simplified

videos.title: How The Backend Works || node js
videos.description: As we already know, the web is made up of two main parts. The frontend and the backend. The frontend is concerned with presentation and is fairly easy to understand since it is what we interact with daily on the web. The backend, on the other hand, is all of the parts of the web that users do not directly interact with. In this video we are going to discuss the basics of how the backend of a website works by tracing all of the steps that the backend must go through from the moment it receives a request to the point it sends a response back to the client.
videos.author: Web Dev Simplified

videos.title: Bootstrap 5 Crash Course
videos.description: Bootstrap is one of the most widely used CSS frameworks, but it can be quite complex to learn since there are so many features in Bootstrap. In this video I will be breaking down everything you need to know about Bootstrap by covering the entire grid system, 6 popular components, and 6 categories of utility classes.
videos.author: Web Dev Simplified

videos.title: 5 Must Know JavaScript Features That Almost Nobody Knows
videos.description: JavaScript is a vast language with tons of features and it is impossible to know them all. In this video I will be covering 5 features in JavaScript that nobody knows but are incredibly useful.
videos.author: Web Dev Simplified

videos.title: Halloween Prank using python || Learn python
videos.description: Python is a high-level, interpreted, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation. Python is dynamically-typed and garbage-collected
videos.author: Programming Hero

videos.title: 10 Python Tips & Tricks That You Do Not Know
videos.description: Programming becomes enjoyable when we know some tips & tricks. If you're a new python developer and want to learn cool and clever python tips & tricks, this video is for you.
videos.author: Programming Hero
